What's KuCoin?

KuCoin is a globally trusted cryptocurrency exchange known for its expansive selection of digital assets, powerful trading tools, and innovative features. It caters to both novice and professional traders by offering seamless spot, margin, and futures trading in a highly secure environment.

  • Extensive range of cryptocurrencies and trading pairs
  • Advanced trading options including spot, margin, and futures
  • Strong security measures including 2FA and encryption
  • User-friendly platform with a responsive mobile app

What can you trade with KuCoin?

With KuCoin, you can trade the following instruments:

  • Spot Trading: Quantity is measured in base asset units. Your account must have sufficient base and quote balances to trade in both directions.
  • Futures Trading: Includes USDT-Margined, Coin-Margined, and USDC-Margined contracts. Quantity is measured in contracts.

Futures: Margin is set to ISOLATED with up to 25x leverage.

USDT-Margined and USDC-Margined Futures: Account balance must have sufficient quote asset to open positions.

Coin-Margined Futures: Account balance must have sufficient base asset to open positions.

Futures Position Mode: Can be set to Hedge Mode on the exchange platform if desired.

API Key Setup Process

Follow the steps below to create and configure your API keys for KuCoin.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. We use industry-standard encryption to secure your credentials.' %}

1 Create a KuCoin Account

If you don’t already have a KuCoin account, please sign up here.

2 Navigate to API Management

  1. Log in to your KuCoin account.
  2. Click on your profile icon in the upper right.
  3. Select API Management.

3 Configure Your API Key

  1. Click Create API.
  2. Enter a name for the API (e.g., “IsAlgo key”).
  3. Create an API passphrase and store it securely—you will need it later.
  4. Select the required permissions (Spot, futures trading).

4 Enable Security and Whitelist IP

  1. Set up IP whitelisting for added protection.
  2. Paste our server's IP address in the IP whitelist field: {{ server_ip }} and click Add.
  3. Complete 2FA and any other required verification.
  4. Click Confirm to generate your API Key and Secret.

Complete the Integration

Copy your API Key and Secret, then paste them into the integration form in your IsAlgo automate dashboard. Ensure you keep your credentials safe and never share them.
